name: Dusk Bunny
description:
Rules

Dusk Bunny is an endless runner game, in that way you have to run as far as you can. Beware of incoming obstacles and jump over to avoid them. You can pickup carrots to get more power to take higher jumps. Moreover each 10th carrot returns you one more life. If you run out of lifes the run is over.

Controls

Use the up/down arrows or w/s keys to move up or down.  The x key will jump the bunny. Press it twice to perform a double jump. The music can be disabled in menu, press start and select "toggle music" to start or stop the music.

Background story

This game is developed for the "a game by its cover" game jam in november 2022 for the virtual console pico-8. The jam requires to choose a famicom-module art from a given collection. I chose "dusk bunny" by Ben Fischer from australia.

Links and Code
  • Buy access to source code on github
  • Special thanks to @snabisch for the great free music and sequences 
  • Famicom concept by Ben Fischer
